languages.text: Each time the Mastiff's attack hits the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}Apprehended{/g} enemy or an enemy around the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Protected{/g} ally, it gets +1 to its key stats. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Each time the Mastiff's attack hits the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}Apprehended{/g} enemy or an enemy around the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Protected{/g} ally, it gets +1 to its key stats. Stacks.

languages.text: Whenever the cyber-mastiff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} enemy or an enemy adjacent to the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally, it gains +1 to its key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Lasts until the end of combat. Stacks.
languages.original_text: Совершая {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} по {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}цели захвата{/g} или по врагу на соседней клетке с союзником {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}под охраной{/g}, кибермастиф получает +1 к своим ключевым {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g}. Суммируется и длится до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the cyber-mastiff hits the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} enemy or an enemy adjacent to the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally, it gains +1 to its key characteristics. Stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

Whenever the cyber-mastiff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} enemy or an enemy adjacent to the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally, it gains +1 to its key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Lasts until the end of combat. Stacks.

Whenever the cyber-mastiff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} enemy or an enemy adjacent to the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally, it gains +1 to its key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Lasts until the end of combat. Stacks.

languages.text: Siber mastif, {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}göz hapsindeki{/g} düşmana veya {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}korunan{/g} dost birimin bitişiğindeki bir düşmana {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g} kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} +1 puan kazanır. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: Whenever the cyber-mastiff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} enemy or an enemy adjacent to the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally, it gains +1 to its key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Lasts until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Siber mastif, {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}göz hapsindeki{/g} düşmana veya {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}korunan{/g} dost birimin bitişiğindeki bir düşmana vurduğunda kilit niteliklerine +1 puan kazanır. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.

Siber mastif, {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}göz hapsindeki{/g} düşmana veya {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}korunan{/g} dost birimin bitişiğindeki bir düşmana vurduğunda kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} +1 puan kazanır. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.

languages.text: Cuando el cibermastín {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}golpea{/g} al enemigo {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apresado{/g} o a un enemigo que esté adyacente al aliado {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protegido{/g}, suma +1 a sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} relevantes. Este efecto dura hasta el final del combate y es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Whenever the cyber-mastiff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} enemy or an enemy adjacent to the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally, it gains +1 to its key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Lasts until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el cibermastín golpea al enemigo {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apresado{/g} o a un enemigo que esté adyacente al aliado {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protegido{/g}, suma +1 a sus características relevantes. Este efecto dura hasta el final del combate y es acumulativo.

languages.text: 每当生化獒犬{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}处于{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕获{/g}状态的敌人，或与{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}受到守护{/g}的盟友相邻的敌人时，它的关键{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}都会提高1点。此效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Whenever the cyber-mastiff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} enemy or an enemy adjacent to the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally, it gains +1 to its key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Lasts until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 每当生化獒犬命中处于{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕获{/g}状态的敌人，或与{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}受到守护{/g}的盟友相邻的敌人时，它的关键属性都会提高1点。此效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Wenn der Cyber-Mastiff den {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}gefassten{/g} Gegner oder einen Gegner {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, der an den {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}beschützten{/g} Verbündeten angrenzt, erhält er +1 auf seine wesentlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}. Hält bis zum Ende des Kampfes an. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Whenever the cyber-mastiff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} enemy or an enemy adjacent to the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally, it gains +1 to its key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Lasts until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Cyber-Mastiff den {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}gefassten{/g} Gegner oder einen Gegner trifft, der an den {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}beschützten{/g} Verbündeten angrenzt, erhält er +1 auf seine wesentlichen Eigenschaften. Hält bis zum Ende des Kampfes an. Stapelbar.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le cyber-mastiff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} l'ennemi {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}appréhendé{/g} ou un ennemi adjacent à l'allié {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protégé{/g}, il gagne +1 à ses {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} clés. Dure jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: Whenever the cyber-mastiff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} enemy or an enemy adjacent to the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally, it gains +1 to its key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Lasts until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le cyber-mastiff touche l'ennemi {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}appréhendé{/g} ou un ennemi adjacent à l'allié {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protégé{/g}, il gagne +1 à ses caractéristiques clés. Dure jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.

languages.text: サイバーマスチフが{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕縛された{/g}敵または{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}保護された{/g}味方に隣接する敵を{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}すると、その主要な{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}が+1される。戦闘終了まで継続する。この効果はスタックする。
languages.original_text: Whenever the cyber-mastiff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} enemy or an enemy adjacent to the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally, it gains +1 to its key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Lasts until the end of combat. Stacks.

サイバーマスチフが{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕縛された{/g}敵または{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}保護された{/g}味方に隣接する敵を攻撃すると、その主要な特性が+1される。戦闘終了まで継続する。この効果はスタックする。

traits.locale_text: Совершая попадание по {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}цели захвата{/g} или по врагу на соседней клетке с союзником {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}под охраной{/g}, кибермастиф получает +1 к своим ключевым характеристикам. Суммируется и длится до конца боя.

Совершая попадание по {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}цели захвата{/g} или по врагу на соседней клетке с союзником {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}под охраной{/g}, кибермастиф получает +1 к своим ключевым характеристикам. Суммируется и длится до конца боя.
